attributes.action: stop allowing local authorities to apply for and be granted "selective licensing"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Under some housing act local authorities can apply for permission to implement selective licensing. SL does nothing to improve private sector housing and is just a means for local government to raise money with another tax.  In Manchester 3 areas have been granted selective licensing which requires landlords to register at a cost of £500 per property. This equates to an estimated £10m income for what is basically a paper excercise.. It's a sham.
